user_profile.name: Omar Al-Mansoor
user_profile.description: Omar is a 40-year-old Middle Eastern professional who works in a technical office environment. Despite being a novice in technology, his creative approach and rational decision-making style drive him to seek effective solutions, such as setting medication reminders, to improve his health and manage his sedentary lifestyle. With a very urgent time constraint and a reserved yet patient demeanor, he aims for straightforward methods that align with his structured reading and writing learning style.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Reminder for daily medication intake during work hours
Notifications to manage dosage timings while in the office
Syncing reminders with calendar applications to avoid missed doses
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online App Store or Google Play Store
additional_requirements: User-friendly interface for novice tech experience
Option to receive reminders through email and text
Ability to log medication intake for tracking purposes

examples: I need a smartphone with a good camera and decent battery life. Something reliable for everyday use.
Looking for a gaming laptop that can handle new releases. I'd prefer something with a good display.
Can you recommend a home security system? We have a medium-sized house and would need outdoor coverage.
